content: प्रपातः {@--1@} Going forth or away, departure. {@--2@} Falling down or into, a fall; मनोरथानामतटप्रपातः <ls>Ś. 6. 9</ls>; <ls>Ku. 6. 57.</ls> {@--3@} A sudden attack. {@--4@} A cascade, waterfall, the place over which water falls down; <ls>R. 2. 26.</ls> {@--5@} A bank, shore. {@--6@} A precipice, steep rock. {@--7@} Falling out or loss, as in केशप्रपात. {@--8@} Emission, discharge, efflux, as in वीर्यप्रपात. {@--9@} Throwing oneself down from a rock. {@--10@} A particular mode of flight.
